ModMetaData.name: Craftable synthread and hyperweave
ModMetaData.author: synogen
ModMetaData.description: Craft synthread and hyperweave at your tailor benches. Requires researching both synthread and hyperweave first. A multi-analyzer is needed as well as these are higher technologies. Synthread requires cloth and steel to make, hyperweave requires synthread, silver, plaststeel and devilstrand.
